title: Manchester United: Rachel Riley cheers on Red Devils with a very sneaky TV set-up in the Countdown studio

organizations.name: red devils manchester united's daley blind

text:
EFL Whatever it takes Manchester United: Rachel Riley cheers on Red Devils with a very sneaky TV set-up in the Countdown studio 
Brainbox beauty proves she won't be deterred from watching her team's early Europa League kick-off against St Etienne By ANTHONY CHAPMAN Comments SHE is one of Britain’s brainiest TV personalities. 
But Rachel Riley’s commitment to her job on Countdown means she doesn’t always get the chance to catch her beloved Manchester United in action. Twitter/@RachelRileyRR 5 Rachel Riley has found a novel way of making sure she watches Man Utd on TV 
However, the 8 Out Of 10 Cats star has found a novel way of beating the system for today’s early Europa League clash against St Etienne. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
For Riley has managed to fit an out-of-sight television behind the famous Countdown board, allowing her to cast some sly gazes while the next episode of the popular quiz show is being recorded. 
Riley has made no secret of her support for the Red Devils and clearly doesn’t mind if her employer knows about the cheeky set-up. PA:Press Association Riley has made no secret of her love for the Red Devils Manchester United's Daley Blind stars in adidas ad that mocks his good looks! Sky Sports 5 Riley is co-host of 'Friday Night Football' with Jeff Stelling 
Riley's become a popular figure amongst football fans and she was handed the keys to the ‘Friday Night Football’ show alongside Jeff Stelling when it kicked off last August. 
The pair later paid tribute to United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic by creating a stunning mosaic of his face using 1,200 replica shirts but the lack of Friday night matches means they've only appeared on air together a handful of times this season. Related Articles Bros battle Florentin Pogba: The Saint-Etienne centre-half who will share a pitch with his brother Paul at Old Trafford taking no chances Manchester United fans bemused strong team to face Saint Etienne despite 3-0 aggregate lead MIDWEEK MADNESS Why are Man United playing their Europa League tie against Saint Etienne on a Wednesday? THE BIGGEST LOSERS Forget Man Utd and Leicester's Euro clashes, match of the day is friendly between San Marino and Andorra Reuters Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored a treble in the first-leg against St Etienne Reuters Henrikh Mkhitaryan opened the scoring during the return fixture in France 

United are currently hoping to book their place in the next stage of the Europa League after winning the first leg 3-0 at Old Trafford. 
Henrikh Mkhitaryan gave them an early lead in France but fans will be worried after he was forced to come off the pitch injured.
